parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Secondary information related to custom functions. Values allowed are @createdBy@, @modifiedBy@. You can include all these values by separating them with commas in the API request.

schema.description: Secondary information related to custom functions. Values allowed are @createdBy@, @modifiedBy@. You can include all these values by separating them with commas in the API request.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Category of custom function. Category are @AUTOMATION@|@SCHEDULER@. If category isnt mentioned all custom functions will be listed

schema.description: Category of custom function. Category are @AUTOMATION@|@SCHEDULER@. If category isnt mentioned all custom functions will be listed
